title: Diagram-Based Mathematics Learning Design for Structuring Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math concepts and ability to use online learning tools
context.additional_context: Applying structured learning outcome visualization strategies to strengthen self-directed learning competencies for general citizen learners.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically classify intended learning outcomes (ILOs) for mathematics subjects using structured diagramming techniques.
Learners can establish personalized learning plans by analyzing diagram-based learning pathways.
Learners can reassess and adjust structured learning outcomes based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
